briefdescription.para: Creates a presence model specifying an activity.

detaileddescription.para:
activity
The activity to set for the created presence model.
description
An additional description of the activity (mainly useful for the 'other' activity). Set it to NULL to not add a description.
The created presence model, or NULL if an error occured.
linphone_presence_model_new
linphone_presence_model_new_with_activity_and_note The created presence model has the activity specified in the parameters.

memberdef.argsstring: (LinphonePresenceActivityType activity, const char *description, const char *note, const char *lang)
memberdef.name: linphone_presence_model_new_with_activity_and_note

briefdescription.para: Creates a presence model specifying an activity and adding a note.

detaileddescription.para:
activity
The activity to set for the created presence model.
description
An additional description of the activity (mainly useful for the 'other' activity). Set it to NULL to not add a description.
note
An additional note giving additional information about the contact presence.
lang
The language the note is written in. It can be set to NULL in order to not specify the language of the note.
The created presence model, or NULL if an error occured.
linphone_presence_model_new_with_activity
linphone_presence_model_new_with_activity_and_note The created presence model has the activity and the note specified in the parameters.

briefdescription.para: Gets the basic status of a presence model.

parameterdescription.para: The LinphonePresenceModel object to get the basic status from.

simplesect.para: The LinphonePresenceBasicStatus of the LinphonePresenceModel object given as parameter.

briefdescription.para: Sets the basic status of a presence model.

parameterdescription.para: The LinphonePresenceModel object for which to set the basic status.
The LinphonePresenceBasicStatus to set for the LinphonePresenceModel object.

simplesect.para: 0 if successful, a value < 0 in case of error.

briefdescription.para: Gets the timestamp of a presence model.

parameterdescription.para: The LinphonePresenceModel object to get the timestamp from.

simplesect.para: The timestamp of the LinphonePresenceModel object or -1 on error.

briefdescription.para: Gets the contact of a presence model.

detaileddescription.para:
model
The LinphonePresenceModel object to get the contact from.
A pointer to a dynamically allocated string containing the contact, or NULL if no contact is found. The returned string is to be freed by calling ms_free().

briefdescription.para: Sets the contact of a presence model.

parameterdescription.para: The LinphonePresenceModel object for which to set the contact.
The contact string to set.

simplesect.para: 0 if successful, a value < 0 in case of error.

briefdescription.para: Sets the presentity of a presence model.

parameterdescription.para: The LinphonePresenceModel object for which to set the contact.
The presentity address to set (presentity is copied).

simplesect.para: 0 if successful, a value < 0 in case of error.

briefdescription.para: Gets the presentity of a presence model.

parameterdescription.para: The LinphonePresenceModel object to get the contact from.

simplesect.para: A pointer to a const LinphoneAddress, or NULL if no contact is found.

briefdescription.para: Gets the first activity of a presence model (there is usually only one).

parameterdescription.para: The LinphonePresenceModel object to get the activity from.

simplesect.para: A LinphonePresenceActivity object if successful, NULL otherwise.

briefdescription.para: Sets the activity of a presence model (limits to only one activity).

detaileddescription.para:
model
The LinphonePresenceModel object for which to set the activity.
activity
The LinphonePresenceActivityType to set for the model.
description
An additional description of the activity to set for the model. Can be NULL if no additional description is to be added.
0 if successful, a value < 0 in case of error. WARNING: This function will modify the basic status of the model according to the activity being set. If you don't want the basic status to be modified automatically, you can use the combination of linphone_presence_model_set_basic_status(), linphone_presence_model_clear_activities() and linphone_presence_model_add_activity().

briefdescription.para: Gets the number of activities included in the presence model.

parameterdescription.para: The LinphonePresenceModel object to get the number of activities from.

simplesect.para: The number of activities included in the LinphonePresenceModel object.

briefdescription.para: Gets the nth activity of a presence model.

parameterdescription.para: The LinphonePresenceModel object to get the activity from.
The index of the activity to get (the first activity having the index 0).

simplesect.para: A pointer to a LinphonePresenceActivity object if successful, NULL otherwise.

briefdescription.para: Adds an activity to a presence model.

parameterdescription.para: The LinphonePresenceModel object for which to add an activity.
The LinphonePresenceActivity object to add to the model.

simplesect.para: 0 if successful, a value < 0 in case of error.

briefdescription.para: Clears the activities of a presence model.

parameterdescription.para: The LinphonePresenceModel object for which to clear the activities.

simplesect.para: 0 if successful, a value < 0 in case of error.

briefdescription.para: Gets the first note of a presence model (there is usually only one).

parameterdescription.para: The LinphonePresenceModel object to get the note from.
The language of the note to get. Can be NULL to get a note that has no language specified or to get the first note whatever language it is written into.

simplesect.para: A pointer to a LinphonePresenceNote object if successful, NULL otherwise.

briefdescription.para: Adds a note to a presence model.

detaileddescription.para:
model
The LinphonePresenceModel object to add a note to.
note_content
The note to be added to the presence model.
lang
The language of the note to be added. Can be NULL if no language is to be specified for the note.
0 if successful, a value < 0 in case of error. Only one note for each language can be set, so e.g. setting a note for the 'fr' language if there is only one will replace the existing one.

briefdescription.para: Clears all the notes of a presence model.

parameterdescription.para: The LinphonePresenceModel for which to clear notes.

simplesect.para: 0 if successful, a value < 0 in case of error.

briefdescription.para: Get the consolidated presence from a presence model.

parameterdescription.para: LinphonePresenceModel object

simplesect.para: The LinphoneConsolidatedPresence corresponding to the presence model

briefdescription.para: Creates a default presence model.

detaileddescription.para:
The created presence model, NULL on error.
linphone_presence_model_new_with_activity
linphone_presence_model_new_with_activity_and_note The created presence model is considered 'offline'.

briefdescription.para: Gets the number of services included in the presence model.

parameterdescription.para: The LinphonePresenceModel object to get the number of services from.

simplesect.para: The number of services included in the LinphonePresenceModel object.

briefdescription.para: Gets the nth service of a presence model.

The index of the service to get (the first service having the index 0).

simplesect.para: A pointer to a LinphonePresenceService object if successful, NULL otherwise.

briefdescription.para: Adds a service to a presence model.

parameterdescription.para: The LinphonePresenceModel object for which to add a service.
The LinphonePresenceService object to add to the model.

simplesect.para: 0 if successful, a value < 0 in case of error.

briefdescription.para: Clears the services of a presence model.

parameterdescription.para: The LinphonePresenceModel object for which to clear the services.

simplesect.para: 0 if successful, a value < 0 in case of error.

briefdescription.para: Gets the number of persons included in the presence model.

parameterdescription.para: The LinphonePresenceModel object to get the number of persons from.

simplesect.para: The number of persons included in the LinphonePresenceModel object.

briefdescription.para: Gets the nth person of a presence model.

parameterdescription.para: The LinphonePresenceModel object to get the person from.
The index of the person to get (the first person having the index 0).

simplesect.para: A pointer to a LinphonePresencePerson object if successful, NULL otherwise.

briefdescription.para: Adds a person to a presence model.

parameterdescription.para: The LinphonePresenceModel object for which to add a person.
The LinphonePresencePerson object to add to the model.

simplesect.para: 0 if successful, a value < 0 in case of error.

briefdescription.para: Clears the persons of a presence model.

parameterdescription.para: The LinphonePresenceModel object for which to clear the persons.

simplesect.para: 0 if successful, a value < 0 in case of error.

briefdescription.para: Tells whether a presence model is considered online.

detaileddescription.para:
It is any of theses cases:
basic status is'open' and no activities
explicit 'online' tag in the status
model
LinphonePresenceModel object
A boolean value telling whether the presence model is considered online or not.

briefdescription.para: Gets the string representation of a presence basic status.

detaileddescription.para:
basic_status
A LinphonePresenceBasicStatus for which to get a string representation.
A pointer a dynamically allocated string representing the given basic status. The returned string is to be freed by calling ms_free().

briefdescription.para: Creates a presence service.

detaileddescription.para:
id
The id of the presence service to be created. Can be NULL to generate it automatically.
basic_status
The LinphonePresenceBasicStatus to set for the LinphonePresenceService object.
contact
The contact string to set.
The created presence service, NULL on error. The created presence service has the basic status 'closed'.

briefdescription.para: Gets the id of a presence service.

detaileddescription.para:
service
The LinphonePresenceService object to get the id from.
A pointer to a dynamically allocated string containing the id, or NULL in case of error. The returned string is to be freed by calling ms_free().

briefdescription.para: Sets the id of a presence service.

parameterdescription.para: The LinphonePresenceService object for which to set the id.
The id string to set. Can be NULL to generate it automatically.

simplesect.para: 0 if successful, a value < 0 in case of error.

simplesect.para: The LinphonePresenceBasicStatus of the LinphonePresenceService object given as parameter.

simplesect.para: 0 if successful, a value < 0 in case of error.

service

briefdescription.para: Creates a presence person.

parameterdescription.para: The id of the presence person to be created. Can be NULL to generate it automatically.

simplesect.para: The created presence person, NULL on error.

person
The LinphonePresencePerson object to get the id from.
A pointer to a dynamically allocated string containing the id, or NULL in case of error. The returned string is to be freed by calling ms_free().

The id string to set. Can be NULL to generate it automatically.

simplesect.para: 0 if successful, a value < 0 in case of error.

briefdescription.para: Creates a presence activity.

parameterdescription.para: The LinphonePresenceActivityType to set for the activity.
An additional description of the activity to set for the activity. Can be NULL if no additional description is to be added.

simplesect.para: The created presence activity, NULL on error.

briefdescription.para: Gets the string representation of a presence activity.

detaileddescription.para:
activity
A pointer to the LinphonePresenceActivity object for which to get a string representation.
A pointer a dynamically allocated string representing the given activity. The returned string is to be freed by calling ms_free().

briefdescription.para: Gets the activity type of a presence activity.

parameterdescription.para: A pointer to the LinphonePresenceActivity for which to get the type.

simplesect.para: The LinphonePresenceActivityType of the activity.

briefdescription.para: Sets the type of activity of a presence activity.

parameterdescription.para: The LinphonePresenceActivity for which to set for the activity type.
The activity type to set for the activity.

simplesect.para: 0 if successful, a value < 0 in case of error.

briefdescription.para: Gets the description of a presence activity.

parameterdescription.para: A pointer to the LinphonePresenceActivity for which to get the description.

simplesect.para: A pointer to the description string of the presence activity, or NULL if no description is specified.

briefdescription.para: Sets the description of a presence activity.

parameterdescription.para: The LinphonePresenceActivity object for which to set the description.
An additional description of the activity. Can be NULL if no additional description is to be added.

simplesect.para: 0 if successful, a value < 0 in case of error.

briefdescription.para: Creates a presence note.

parameterdescription.para: The content of the note to be created.
The language of the note to be created. Can be NULL if no language is to be specified for the note.

simplesect.para: The created presence note, NULL on error.

The language of the note.

simplesect.para: 0 if successful, a value < 0 in case of error.

briefdescription.para: Increase the reference count of the LinphonePresenceModel object.

parameterdescription.para: The LinphonePresenceModel object for which the reference count is to be increased.

simplesect.para: The LinphonePresenceModel object with the increased reference count.

briefdescription.para: Decrease the reference count of the LinphonePresenceModel object and destroy it if it reaches 0.

parameterdescription.para: The LinphonePresenceModel object for which the reference count is to be decreased.

simplesect.para: The LinphonePresenceModel object if the reference count is still positive, NULL if the object has been destroyed.
